name: Matt Bolles' Personal Website
description: This website - meta, isn't it? Created to serve as a portfolio and online resume. Always under construction to make it better, so check back soon!

name: Momentus
description: Full stack social media application with a focus on giving creatives robust control over how they display and organize their work. Developed with a team of 5 other students led by myself.
technologies: JavaScript, ReactJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS, Redux, Bootstrap, MySQL, AWS, Heroku, HTML, CSS
